Are people stupid enough to actually believe Russia DIDN’T try to hack as purported in the media. Of course they did, as did China, as did Wikileaks, as did anyone with tech savvy, loose ethics and an interest in the US election. Just as we do in other nations’ elections, I suspect. The extent to which Russian activities influenced the outcome and the extent to which Russia colluded with Trump, as recent unsubstantiated allegations state, is a legitimate source of great debate. But to suggest the Russians have no motive or means to hack into American resources is the height of naivete.

I’d love to see your evidence before answering this question. I do have to mention that when all intelligence agencies of the country agree on something like this, i’d like to believe they are not all in some powerful conspiracy. I do appreciate skepticism, but unless you have your own evidence as a result of your detailed investigation to claim what you are with your question, I tend to believe the agencies… at least more than I believe Trump, which I consider vastly more naive (or stupid as you called it)
